swap.title: Swap
swap.info_token_content: NEMO token (also known as 'NEMO') is a Blockchain stablecoin backed by NEMO Platform - a management and operation platform that automates the decentralized digital economy model. The core principle is to use automated tools & technologies to oversee the value of NEMO tokens. NEMO value is pegged to the price of another asset, hence the term 'stable'. Now, NEMO is valued at 0.1 USDT. 1 NEMO = 0.1$ (USTD) NEMO Token is also a common co-use currency for all projects on NEMO Platform. NEMO is a critical material for Land owners and players participated in GaliXCity. Since, they will need to use NEMO to upgrade LAND or city. The higher the level, the more NEMOs are required. Aside from obtaining NEMO token through trading, players can also receive NEMO Tokens when participating in in-game PvE, PvP, AvA activities. NSF (NEMO Stability Facility) is a special purpose instrument designed to maintain the stability of NEMO exchange rate by managing the treasury and supporting stable NEMO buying/selling activities on anti-de-peg platforms, with a guarantee mechanism for both NEMO/USDT liquidity. NSS (NEMO Stimulation System) includes fiscal tools that assist with increasing the spending on NEMO System, reducing short-term interest rate and cutting down on item exchange fees. Both NSF and NSS have a range of tools that can be used to stimulate demand and economic growth, and provide stable and long-lasting NEMO for all three targeted audiences: • Player/User • Holders/Investor • Studio/Publisher

event.event_descrip: You lock crypto assets for a certain period of time. Then you will earn more crypto.
event.descrip_txt_1: 1. When Unstake early, the interest will be reduced to the minimum (equal to the flexible package)
event.descrip_txt_2: 2. After the transfering, the profit returned will be equal to the amount after deduction.
event.descrip_txt_3: Early redemption results in loss interset incurred as a late payment fee.
event.read_agree: I have read and I agree to
event.not_have_token: You don't have token to claim
event.fee_changed_mint_again: Fee mint resource changed, plesae mint resource again
event.not_enough_point: You have not enough Dev points to upgrade Land
event.max_level_land: The maximum level of Land is 8
event.mint_resource_descrip: You can mint resource every 12hrs. The Fee wil increase after each time mint resource. The mor valuable the package you choose, the higher fee you pay.
event.specify_quantity_resources: Specify the quantity of resources to mint
event.guide_1: 1. Wallet ower's total land level will decide how high their Mystery House level will be.
event.guide_2: 2. Summon rate of all hero quality depend on Mystery House's current level
event.guide_3: 3. After getting a Land NFT from any sources to your wallet, your land will be locked for 24 hours and will not increase Mystery House level in this locked state.
event.guide_4: 4. The 18 NEMO fee for each hero summon at Mystery House will stay unchange.
event.guide_5: 5. Each time summon Heros at Mystery House there will be a small chance to get more than 1 star Hero. Powerful 4 Star Heros are waiting for the luckiest Captain to obtain! Chance to get more than 1 star Heros increases as Mystery House level increases.
event.guide_example: - Example: If Wallet's ower had 1 Land Level 1 and 1 Land Level 2, his/her Mystery House level would be Level 3, equal to combination of all land level.
event.descrip_2: 2. The Land Map is determined by three unit levels, from the largest to the smallest: zone (32x32), position (16x16), and land (4x4).
event.descrip_3: 3. Select any coordinate to view details about the Land within.
event.land_level_descrip: Land Level: The level of reserves, mines and monsters are dependent on the Land level.
event.owner_descrip: Owner: an Ethereum wallet that has the land NFT. Owner can customize the color of the land.
event.dev_reward_descrip: Development Reward: NEMO token will be rewarded to Landowners based on Land‘s development rate.
event.resource_reward_descrip: Resource Reward: Collecting activities on Land will accumulate essential resources, Landowners can claim them periodically from the Land Portal.
event.name: Name

rule_9dnft.rule_1: 1. INO event will consist of 2 rounds: Private and Public.
rule_9dnft.rule_2: 2. Private Round will take place within 3 hours, from 10:10 to 13:10 on March 21, 2023 (UTC+7).
rule_9dnft.rule_2_2: - Only users who have whitelist slots can participate in this round.
rule_9dnft.rule_3: 3. Public Round 1 will take place within 21 hours, starting from 13:10 on March 21, 2023 to 10:10 on March 22, 2023 (UTC+7).
rule_9dnft.rule_3_3: - Each wallet can buy many Boxes, but can only buy 1 Box at a time.
rule_9dnft.rule_3_6: - After successful transaction, NFT Box will be sent to buyer‘s wallet.
rule_9dnft.rule_4: 4. Round 2 will take place within 24 hours, from 11:11 on March 22, 2023 to 11:11 on March 23, 2023 (UTC+7).
rule_9dnft.rule_4_5: - After successful transaction, NFT Box will be sent to buyer‘s wallet.
rule_9dnft.rule_5_1: - You can open the nft box right after purchasing, random rewards will be sent to the inventory.
rule_9dnft.rule_5_2: - Both NFT Box and NFT Box‘s rewards can be exchanged on Marketplace.
rule_9dnft.rule_6: 6. If there is any issue when opening our NFT Box, your error Box will be listed and can be reopened via 'List Error Box' Button.

rule_mecha.rule_1: 1. INO event will consist of 2 rounds: Private and Public.
rule_mecha.rule_2: 2. Private Round will take place within 3 hours, from 10:10 to 13:10 on February 16, 2023 (UTC+7).
rule_mecha.rule_2_2: - Only users who have whitelist slots can participate in this round.
rule_mecha.rule_2_3: - Each wallet can buy many Boxes, but can only buy 1 Box at a time.
rule_mecha.rule_2_6: - After successful purchase, buyers will receive NFT Box in Wallet's Inventory.
rule_mecha.rule_3: 3. Public Round 1 will take place within 24 hours, starting from 14:00 on February 16, 2023 to 14:00 on February 17, 2023 (UTC+7).
rule_mecha.rule_3_2: - Buy 5 Box or more to get 40% discount.
rule_mecha.rule_3_3: - Anyone who has NEMO wallet can join the Public Round.
rule_mecha.rule_3_4: - Each wallet can buy many Boxes, but can only buy 1 Box at a time.
rule_mecha.rule_3_7: - After successful transaction, NFT Box will be sent to buyer's wallet and show up in the Inventory.
rule_mecha.rule_3_8: - With wallet buy 5 Boxes or more. After the Public Round ends, the Admin will send back the amount of NEMO corresponding to 10% of the Box value for each Box purchased. (no later than 24 hours after the end of the Public Round 1).
rule_mecha.rule_3_9: - Round 2 public time will be announced after the end of Round 1.
rule_mecha.rule_4_1: - You can open NFT Box at 11:11 on February 18, 2023 (UTC+7).
rule_mecha.rule_4_5: - After successful transaction, NFT Box will be sent to buyer's wallet.
rule_mecha.rule_5: 5. If there is any issue when opening our NFT Box, your error Box will be listed and can be reopened via 'List Error Box' Button.

rule_galiX.rule_1: 1. INO event shall consist of 2 rounds: Private and Public
rule_galiX.rule_2: 2. Private Round will take place within 12 hours, from 10:10 to 22:10 on September 5, 2022 (UTC+7).
rule_galiX.rule_2_1: - Only GaliXTicket holders can participate in this round.
rule_galiX.rule_2_2: - Each wallet can buy many Boxes, but can only buy 1 Box at a time.
rule_galiX.rule_2_5: - After successful purchased, buyer will receive NFT Box to Wallet Inventory and GaliXTicket will be burned
rule_galiX.rule_3: 3. Public Round shall take place within 24 hours, starting from 22:10 on September 5, 2022 (UTC+7) to 22:10 on September 6, 2022 (UTC+7)
rule_galiX.rule_3_1: The remaining Boxes after the Private Round will be sold in the Public Round
rule_galiX.rule_3_2: - Each wallet can buy many Boxes, but can only buy 1 Box at a time.
rule_galiX.rule_3_5: - After successful purchased, NFT Box will be sent to the buyer wallet and appear in the Inventory.
rule_galiX.rule_4_2: - NFT BOX in Inventory can only be opened from the above time
rule_galiX.rule_4_3: - When opening the NFT Box, random rewards will be sent to Inventory.
rule_galiX.rule_4_4: - Both NFT Box and NFT Box rewards can be exchanged on Marketplace
rule_galiX.rule_5: 5. If there is any issue when opening our NFT Box, your error Box will be listed and can be reopened through List Error Box Button
